pages.text: Creepballs are catalysts made from decayed organic materials to grow a rare microbiological colony that resides in soul sand.
Plant on soul sand to spread the colony...

pages.title: Bio for the Masses
pages.text: Creep blocks provide very fertile land when tilled with a glaive. These can cultivate biomass by fermenting nether warts and germinating them on an Altar of Blood.
Biomass seeds need to be germinated on an Altar of Blood first and then be planted in tilled creep blocks.
